tool_description: Amazon products and reviews easy API.
name: Amazon Easy API
title: Amazon Easy API

api_list.name: Amazon Product Information
api_list.description: Gives all the product information from an Amazon product.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-easy-api.p.rapidapi.com/products/B0CB74GC69"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-easy-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-easy-api.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-easy-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Amazon Offers
api_list.description: Amazon offers from a given product ID.
